com.clarionmedia.infinitum.rest
Class RestfulMapper

java.lang.Object
  com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.ObjectMapper
      com.clarionmedia.infinitum.rest.RestfulMapper
Direct Known Subclasses:
RestfulJsonMapper, RestfulNameValueMapper, RestfulXmlMapper
public abstract class RestfulMapper
extends ObjectMapper

This abstract implementation of ObjectMapper provides methods to map domain models to RESTful web service resources.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0 08/05/12
Author:
Tyler Treat

mapModel

public abstract RestfulModelMap mapModel(java.lang.Object model)
                                  throws InvalidMappingException,
                                         ModelConfigurationException
Description copied from class: ObjectMapper
Returns a ModelMap object containing persistent model data values mapped to their respective columns.

Specified by:
mapModel in class ObjectMapper
Parameters:
model - the Object to map
Returns:
ModelMap with the entity's persistent fields mapped to their columns
Throws:
InvalidMappingException - if a type cannot be mapped
ModelConfigurationException - if the model is configured incorrectly
